nodes.text: Blut was a male Sullustan, who worked for the company Culpharm on the planet Cularin, during the time of the Galactic Republic.

Blut was employed by Culpharm as a security guard and in 32 BBY, along with the Sullustan Mien, he was sent to the house of the Cerean Waz-alem Amir, to collect a specimen sample for Culpharm. The following day, he was present in the Culpharm Headquarters Building, in the city of Hedrett.
